name: Agile Development
description: Ability to work efficiently in Agile teams using methodologies such as SCRUM, adapting to changes and delivering iterative improvements.

name: Communication
description: Clear and effective verbal and written communication with team members and stakeholders.

name: Collaboration
description: Working cooperatively with others to achieve shared goals.

name: Problem Solving
description: Identifying issues and finding creative, effective solutions.

name: Adaptability
description: Adjusting quickly to new situations and changing priorities.

name: Time Management
description: Organizing and prioritizing tasks to meet deadlines efficiently.

name: Critical Thinking
description: Analyzing information objectively to make reasoned decisions.

name: Leadership
description: Guiding and motivating team members to achieve project objectives.
